summary: Launches the FastAPI application using uvicorn, listens on port 8932, and provides an option for auto-reloading with --reload. However, the comment suggests not to use the reload feature.

details.comment: Launches the FastAPI application using uvicorn, listens on port 8932, and provides an option for auto-reloading with --reload. However, the comment suggests not to use the reload feature.
details.content:
python3 -m uvicorn filter_py3_fastapi:app --port 8932 
# python3 -m uvicorn filter_py3_fastapi:app --reload --port 8932 
# do not use reload!
